contentList.content:
Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are seven levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Short Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1. Taking a Long Rest will remove all levels of it.

Movement cost is higher by 10%. All Ability Checks,Attack Rolls,Saving Throws are reduced by 1. Armour Class is reduced by 1.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are seven levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Short Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1. Taking a Long Rest will remove all levels of it.

Movement cost is higher by 20%. All Ability Checks,Attack Rolls,Saving Throws are reduced by 2. Armour Class is reduced by 2.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are seven levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Short Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1. Taking a Long Rest will remove all levels of it.

Movement cost is higher by 30%. All Ability Checks,Attack Rolls,Saving Throws are reduced by 3. Armour Class is reduced by 3. All Skill Check rolls are reduced by 3. Disadvantage on Stealth, Survival, Perception Skill Check rolls.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are seven levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Short Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1. Taking a Long Rest will remove all levels of it.

Movement cost is higher by 50%. All Ability Checks,Attack Rolls,Saving Throws are reduced by 4. Armour Class is reduced by 4. All Skill Check rolls are reduced by 4. Disadvantage on Stealth, Survival, Perception, Sleight of Hand Skill Check rolls.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are seven levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Short Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1. Taking a Long Rest will remove all levels of it.

Movement cost is higher by 70%. All Ability Checks,Attack Rolls,Saving Throws are reduced by 5. Armour Class is reduced by 5. All Skill Check rolls are reduced by 5. Disadvantage on Stealth, Survival, Perception, Sleight of Hand,Investigation. Skill Check rolls.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are seven levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Short Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1. Taking a Long Rest will remove all levels of it.

Movement cost is higher by by 90%. All Ability Checks,Attack Rolls,Saving Throws are reduced by 6. Armour Class is reduced by 6. All Skill Check rolls are reduced by 6. Disadvantage on Stealth, Survival, Perception, Sleight of Hand, Investigation,Athletics, Acrobatics Skill Check rolls. Cannot take reactions.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are seven levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Short Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1. Taking a Long Rest will remove all levels of it.

Movement cost is doubled. All Ability Checks,Attack Rolls,Saving Throws are reduced by 7. Armour Class is reduced by 7. All Skill Check rolls are reduced by 7. Disadvantage on all Skill Check rolls. Disadvantage on Attack Rolls. Cannot take reactions.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are six levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Long Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1.

< Disadvantage on Ability Checks

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are six levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Long Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1.

< Disadvantage on Ability Checks. Movement Speed halved.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are six levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Long Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1.

< Disadvantage on Ability Checks. Movement Speed halved. Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are six levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Long Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1.

< Disadvantage on Ability Checks. Movement Speed halved. Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Saving Throws. Hit point maximum halved.

Lack of rest has left you exhausted. There are six levels of exhaustion, and each level is worse than the last. Completing a Long Rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1.

< Disadvantage on Ability Checks. Movement Speed reduced to 0. Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Saving Throws. Hit point maximum halved.

< The next exhaustion level will kill the hero.
Exhaustion remove level on short rest
Exhaustion remove one level on long rest
Exhaustion remove all levels on long rest
